backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend that handles user profiles, announcements, and contact inquiries with role-based access control (admin/user permissions) using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features — displaying committee name in the Header and replacing 'जैनपुर' with 'जौनपुर' across files — to their affected source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one- to two-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, styling, and notable recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page language to Hindi, title, favicon, and meta description for the Masjid-e-Ghousia Welfare Committee site with corrected 'जौनपुर' spelling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections in order (Hero, About, Services, Announcements, Gallery, Donate, Contact) with dividers, wraps everything in a React Query provider, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal for newly authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying four value cards (service, education, unity, honesty) and a mission panel with a Quranic quote; stat counters are all set to zero.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementsSec: Announcements section that fetches data via React Query and renders loading, error, empty, or grid-of-cards states for committee announcements with Hindi-formatted dates.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section with mosque address, phone, email, and office hours cards, plus a validated inquiry form that submits via the useSubmitInquiry hook.
frontend/src/components/DecorativePatter: A simple presentational component that overlays a full-bleed geometric pattern image with configurable opacity for decorative backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/DonateSection.ts: Displays a donation section with bank transfer details (copyable fields), impact statistics, and a Quranic quote, using DecorativePattern for background styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with logo/branding, quick navigation links, contact info, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Photo gallery section displaying a 2026 annual event album in a grid with a keyboard-accessible lightbox for full-screen image navigation.
frontend/src/components/GeometricDivider: A purely decorative component that renders a full-width section divider image with a max height of 80px.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed site header with logo, smooth-scroll navigation links, a donate button, a login button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section for the Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee site, displaying a mosque background image, Bismillah text, logo, Hindi headings, and CTA buttons for donation and about navigation with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state during authentication and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and saves it as a user profile via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation.
Displays a grid of six welfare services (education, medical, housing, food, literacy, widow support) offered by the committee, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile, user role, and admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching announcements (sorted by date) and submitting contact inquiries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Noto Devanagari fonts, defining CSS custom properties for a warm ivory/orange/gold color palette, and providing base component utility classes like btn-primary, card-base, and section-heading.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, with helpers to persist values in sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with a custom ivory/champagne/orange/gold/forest color palette, Devanagari and Arabic font families, custom shadows, and accordion/fade-in animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking two existing features: displaying the committee name next to the logo in the Header, and correcting the spelling of 'जैनपुर' to 'जौनपुर' across all frontend files.
